summary: "Bohemian Rhapsody" is a famous song by the British rock band Queen, released in 1975. Written by Freddie Mercury, it's a six-minute song with different parts like an intro, a soft ballad, an opera-like section, hard rock, and a quiet ending. It's unique because it doesn't have a repeating chorus. The song was a mix of three songs Mercury wrote and was recorded using many different tapes because of the technology at the time. It became one of Queen's most popular songs, known for its funny opera elements and interesting lyrics. The song was a huge hit worldwide and is still very popular today.
title: Bohemian Rhapsody
